response.raw:
Here is the output, wrapped in the specified tags:

Customer Service Representative Responsibilities

1. Provide product and service information - Answer customer questions about products, services, pricing, features, and options - Explain product benefits and how products or services can meet the customer's needs - Discuss service plans, contracts, warranties, and terms and conditions 2. Process orders and transactions - Take customer orders by phone or in person - Enter order details into the order management system - Process payments and complete transactions - Provide order confirmation numbers and expected delivery dates 3. Handle account changes and cancellations - Assist customers with upgrading, downgrading, or changing their accounts or services - Process account cancellation requests - Explain any early termination fees or other cancellation policies - Attempt to retain customers and offer incentives when appropriate 4. Resolve customer complaints - Listen empathetically to understand the customer's complaint - Apologize for the issue and take ownership of finding a resolution - Investigate the issue and involve other departments as needed - Offer a solution or compensation to resolve the complaint - Follow up to ensure the customer is satisfied with the resolution

1. Handle account changes and cancellations - Assist customers with upgrading, downgrading, or changing their accounts or services - Process account cancellation requests - Explain any early termination fees or other cancellation policies - Attempt to retain customers and offer incentives when appropriate 4. Resolve customer complaints - Listen empathetically to understand the customer's complaint - Apologize for the issue and take ownership of finding a resolution - Investigate the issue and involve other departments as needed - Offer a solution or compensation to resolve the complaint - Follow up to ensure the customer is satisfied with the resolution
